code:
defmodule Solution do
  @spec minimum_added_coins(coins :: [integer], target :: integer) :: integer
  def minimum_added_coins(coins, target) do
    coins = Enum.sort(coins)
    add_coins(0, coins, target, 1)
  end

  defp add_coins(added, [], target, next_coin) when next_coin <= target do
    add_coins(added + 1, [], target, next_coin * 2)
  end
  defp add_coins(added, [h | t], target, next_coin) when next_coin < h do
    add_coins(added + 1, [h | t], target, next_coin * 2)
  end
  defp add_coins(added, [h | t], target, next_coin) when next_coin >= h do
    if h < target do
      add_coins(added, t, target, next_coin + h)
    else
      added
    end
  end
  defp add_coins(added, _, _, _) do
    added
  end
end
